products.title: bracelet
products.description: An absolute must-have for anyone loving the ocean. For every bracelet sold 4Ocean collects one pound of trash out of the ocean and its shores

products.title: notebook
products.description: Make this your last notebook and stop paper waste! You can scan your notes onto your phone and erase them from the notebook when not needed anymore.

products.title: backpack
products.description: World's first rolltop backpack made out of plastic from the sea. For all adventurers out there, perfect for your next trip, or just everyday's journey

products.title: waterbottle
products.description: The waterdrop® Edition Bottle made from high-quality borosilicate glass (20oz or 0.6 liter) helps you drink more water on the go and reduces your carbon footprint. Available in our 6 empowerment designs.

products.title: waterbottle
products.description: The WAKEcup reusable bottle is made from sustainably sourced organic bamboo - a durable, lightweight and stylish material. We've included a leak-proof lid and a double walled interior to keep your water cold for up to 8 hours. Prefer hot drinks? The double-walled interior keeps coffee, tea or soup hot for 2 hours and, as an added bonus, comes with an infuser for loose leaf tea.

products.title: coffee cup
products.description: Perfect for the office, camping or hiking, this compact reusable travel mug is crafted from sustainably sourced organic bamboo with a secure lid and insulated interior to keep your coffee hot. The handle adds a touch of style to a classic zero-waste coffee cup, plus the convenience of grabbing a hot drink on the go, without any pesky spills.

products.title: phonecase
products.description: A durable, stylish, and functional iPhone case made from actual ocean plastic that our captains and crews recovered! To give your iPhone maximum protection, we opted for a two-layer shell case. The hard outer shell is made from rHDPE 4ocean Plastic™ while the soft, impact-absorbent inner shell is made from bio-compostable PBAT rubber.

products.title: shopping bag
products.description: A waterdrop® to go, please! The Edition Bag helps everything reach its destination safely - because this bag has it all. The fruity design, illustrated by the Spanish design studio Nature Press, is also a real eye-catcher. Say goodbye to disposable bags and use our tote bag made of sustainable and stylish materials.

products.title: paper towel
products.description: pandoo 100% bamboo paper towels - washable and eco-friendly - highly absorbent and tear-proof

products.title: keyboard
products.description: A revolutionary new ‘Green Product’ that is expressly created with the eco-conscious consumer in mind is the Impecca Designer Keyboard. Hand-carved from 100% natural biodegradable bamboo material, the well-designed all-the-rage KBB500 promises to be the perfect accessory to any computer. This earth-friendly keyboard connects via USB port and is compatible with Windows 2000 through Windows 10

products.title: straws
products.description: This is your last straw. Thanks to our sustainable 100% stainless steel straws, it's easy to say goodbye to environmentally harmful disposable plastic straws. Available in 4 designs.

products.title: straws
products.description: Using your own bamboo straws is not only environmentally friendly being reusable, recyclable and compostable, they are also anti-microbial and the perfect companion to sip cocktails, iced coffee, smoothies and milkshakes.

products.title: thermos flask
products.description: Our pandoo thermos flask with its useful tea strainer is perfect for your day-to-day life. It keeps your drinks hot for up to 12 hours thanks to its double-walled vacuum isolation.

products.title: hair brush
products.description: The pandoo hairbrush is a vegan and eco-friendly solution for everyone! The rounded bamboo borsts massage your head and stimulate the blood circulation that can boost growth of hair.

products.title: face mask
products.description: Global WAKEcup decided to make their own facemasks. The extremely talented Ciara who looks after all our customer enquiries, makes them by hand from material off cuts and sample books. They are double lined for added protection with organic cotton.

products.title: phone case
products.description: Beautifully designed and eco-friendly, Pela cases are the world’s first truly sustainable phone case. They are durable enough to protect your phone from drops and scratches and are also 100% compostable! As part of our mission to create a waste free future, Pela is a proud member of 1% for the Planet so we can support organizations who are working hard to better the planet.

products.title: bee wax paper
products.description: Start your plastic-free life with this starter kit. Learn how to use each SuperBee’s Wax Wrap for many items in your kitchen and home. Includes 3 different sized beeswax wraps in pretty patterns: Small: 20 cm x 20 cm, Medium: 26 cm x 26 cm and Large: 33 cm x 33 cm.
